project.description:
Android Pie s5p6818 daily build
android_pie_s5p4418_daily build 직후 trigger 됨

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "*****************************************" echo " Jenkins - Android environment setup " echo "*****************************************"
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 export USER=nxJenkins
repo sync
echo "*************************************" echo " Android pie convergence svma " echo "*************************************" . build/envsetup.sh lunch s5p6818_con_svma-userdebug m clean m -j8 ./device/nexell/con_svma/s5p6818_con_svma/copy-results-images.sh -s slsiap -d results_s5p6818_con_svma tar cvzf results_s5p6818_con_svma.tar.gz results_s5p6818_con_svma/*

#!/bin/bash
echo "*************************************" echo " Android pie convergence svma auto quick " echo "*************************************" . build/envsetup.sh lunch s5p6818_con_svma_auto-userdebug m clean m -j8 QUICKBOOT=1 ./device/nexell/con_svma/s5p6818_con_svma/copy-results-images.sh -s slsiap -d results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick tar cvzf results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick.tar.gz results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick/*

#!/bin/bash
echo "************************************" echo " clean old dirs " echo "************************************" rm -rf results_*-daily rm -rf results_*-daily.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename tarballs " echo "************************************" mv results_s5p6818_con_svma.tar.gz results_s5p6818_con_svma-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily.tar.gz mv results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick.tar.gz results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename result dirs " echo "************************************" mv results_s5p6818_con_svma results_s5p6818_con_svma-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily mv results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick results_s5p6818_con_svma_auto-quick-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily
